1.0.name: wordpress/marla
1.0.description: Marla is a free WordPress theme easily to customize. From a single page you can edit lively the colors, logo, footer, social icons, author bio, layout, etc. Started from a homepage with a pinterest like design with infinite scroll to single posts and pages in just one clean column.   Translation ready and available in english and spanish.
